channel.title: Installing TFS SP1
channel.description: This morning I have been installing Team Foundation Server SP1 onto some test TFS instances.  A handy hint for you is that you need to apply KB919156 before installing SP1.  KB919156 is an important patch for TFS that allows it...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Luis Fraile+00:00
item.description: Nice hint, I haven't had time to install it yet, I hope this week I will install, I will post this also in spanish also in my blog
item.dc:creator: Luis Fraile

item.title: Comment by Wes MacDonald+00:00
item.description:
The KB number for TFS SP1 is actually 926738, 928957 is for Visual Studio.
:-) hope you don't mind the update.
item.dc:creator: Wes MacDonald
